content:
The chunk concludes Part 2 of a CG tutorial series focused on modifying shaders in Panda3D, encouraging experimentation with fragment shaders and introducing the upcoming Part 3 as an enhancement.

After modifying the vertex shader, try to modify the fragment shader on your own. In the next tutorial, we will improve the shader's usefulness.

Part 3: The Simplest Possible Useful Shader <cg-tutorial-part-3>
